name: The Grid (itch) (DesertAnanas)
description:
The grid is a game in which you drive a lighted motorcycle that produces a light barrier on an arena where energy discs are thrown from everywhere. Be careful with your movements to try to avoid the discs while avoiding crashing into your own barrier and last as long as possible.

command: 

Press enter/click start button to launch the game.

Use the directional arrows to to direct you
